WRITING.TITLE: TWW2 news compare to TWW1
WRITING.TEXT: seems TWW2 marketing its little bit more small than the previous one? or CA preparing a big news for us? i mean compare to TWW1,it got more news event from 3 to 4 month before it launch before total war warhammer 1 release we got plenty of gameplay video -empire,dwarf,greenskin,vampire,chaos in game trailer -battle of black fire pass -dwarf underground battle -all factions campaign walkthrought all of that its 2 or 3 month away before the game got release what we get with total war warhammer 2 -campaign map trailer -battle of the fallen gates -lizardmen in game trailer -lizardmen and high elves unit roster -ritual mini puzzle game what happen? yes im hyped and impatient but please if u guys need more time just delayed it but if going well and will release in 28 september give us something atleast (bad english detected)

one thing that i love with W2 marketing is the S-.... nope not gonna say that even the introduction video it based on battle of the fallen gates the only thing that make me more interested is campaign map trailer we got little hint here and there like the warp stone and a pyramid looking thing in the far background (still not sure) but the camera its moving too fast i think because well u know CA dont want us to see the Ska.... OH NO NO I'M NOT SAYING IT NOOOOOO (dragged away by witch hunter)

agreed,a lot of mods just reskins and some new model still in the same vanilla animation and gameplay i dont mind paying for dlc if CA doing it well like wood elves and beastmen (chaos should in the vanilla but oh well they have cool model and gameplay mechanic btw)

i hope what CA will do with skaven announcement trailer is not showing the word "skaven" and the trailer just wandering elves scout in the cave (like in the ritual mini game) and in the end a many glowing eyes appeared from the caves that's just my idea OI CA,love the ritual and puzzle so far keep going
the dlc pre order probably tomb kings
either they showing less news compare to previous warhammer or we too much hyped and impatient XD but 3 month before release,we got much more news with warhammer 1
probably free lc like new lord or something
from this teaser and a pic of the note yesterday i can assume in-engine trailer is about dark elves lay siege on high elves settlement or maybe an ambush
